entry.title: Severe Weather Statement issued January 04 at 3:58AM CST until January 04 at 5:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...THE TORNADO WARNING FOR NORTHEASTERN MACON COUNTY IS CANCELLED... The storm which prompted the warning has weakened below severe limits, and no longer appears capable of producing a tornado. Therefore, the warning has been cancelled. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for southeastern and east central Alabama.
